recipe.title: Green Goddess Potato Salad
ingredients: 3 pounds cooked small (2-inch) boiling potatoes, cooled to room temperature and quartered
3 tablespoons tarragon vinegar or white-wine vinegar
3 flat anchovy fillets, chopped, or 2 teaspoons anchovy paste
instructions: Cook beans in a 3-quart saucepan of boiling salted water , uncovered, until crisp-tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain in a sieve, then plunge sieve into a large bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain again. Pat beans dry, then cut into 1/4-inch pieces and put in a large bowl along with potatoes.
Pulse mayonnaise, vinegar, scallions, anchovies, parsley, tarragon, salt, and pepper in a food processor until dressing is pale green and herbs are finely chopped. Stir into potato mixture.
